title: Haikyuu!! Movie 4: Concept no Tatakai
alternative_title: High Kyuu!! Movie 4: Haikyuu!! Movie 4: Battle of Concepts, Haikyuu!!: Karasuno Koukou VS Shiratorizawa Gakuen Koukou Recap, Haikyuu!! Recap 4
description: Recap film that will cover the match against Shiratorizawa Academy that took place in the third season.
